Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/115th
ShortDescription: Southbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Southbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Francisco
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
